analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Vajra Sow.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma lha mo rnams dang bcas pa rnams kyi bdag mo chen mo cher gsang ba chen mo sgyu ma chen mo dbang phyug chen mo 'jig rten gsum po bsdu ba dang slar yang 'jig rten gsum du spro bar
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma lha mo rnams dang bcas pa rnams kyi bdag mo chen mo cher gsang ba chen mo sgyu ma chen mo dbang phyug chen mo 'jig rten gsum po bsdu ba dang slar yang 'jig rten gsum du spro bar
translated: Then the Blessed One, the Great Mistress of the Secret Lords, the Goddesses, the Great Secret, the Great Illusion, the Great Lord, the One who gathers the three worlds and again emanates in the three worlds,

original: bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba ni /
translated: the one who is to be known by the name of Mahāmāyā,

original: 'di ni gsang ba pa rnams yum //
analyzed: 'di ni gsang ba pa rnams yum //
translated: this is the Mother of the Secret Ones,

original: sgyu ma chen mor rnam par grags //
analyzed: sgyu ma chen mor rnam par grags //

original: 'jig rten gsum po skrag mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po skrag mdzad pa'i //
translated: The one who terrifies the three worlds,

original: rig sngags 'di thob dbang phyug che //
analyzed: rig sngags 'di thob dbang phyug che //
translated: attains this knowledge mantra, the Great Lord.

original: gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //
analyzed: gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //

original: sgrub byed dbang phyug rig sngags kyis //
analyzed: sgrub byed dbang phyug rig sngags kyis //

translated: And all the hosts of gods, Yakshas, asuras, humans,

analyzed: rig 'dzin sha za srin po dang // ltos 'gro mi 'am cir bcas rnams //

original: dbang du 'gugs byed 'byung rnams ni //
analyzed: dbang du 'gugs byed 'byung rnams ni //

analyzed: chu skyes thang las skyes rnams kyang // ngo mtshar cher byed rig sngags la //
translated: And the water-born and land-born flowers,🔽And the vidya-mantras that create great wonders,

original: mig 'phrul ltar byed de bzhin du //
analyzed: mig 'phrul ltar byed de bzhin du //

original: rmongs dang rengs byed de bzhin du //
analyzed: rmongs dang rengs byed de bzhin du //

analyzed: rnam par zhe sdang skrod sogs dang // dbang du 'gugs byed rmugs pa dang // dpag med ngo mtshar rnam par rnams //

analyzed: rig sngags bklags pas 'grub 'gyur te //

original: sgrub pa po yi ngag kyang 'grub //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi ngag kyang 'grub //

original: de la bzlas med brtul zhugs med //
analyzed: de la bzlas med brtul zhugs med //
translated: There is no repetition, no observance,

original: smyung gnas cho gas bsgrub mi dgos //
analyzed: smyung gnas cho gas bsgrub mi dgos //

original: lha mos bden pa dag la gsungs //

analyzed: nyon mongs med par dngos grub 'gyur //

analyzed: khyod kyi sngags ni sgyu ma che //

original: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo bklags pas 'grub pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo bklags pas 'grub pa'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: This is the sādhana of the Blessed Great Illusory One, accomplished by recitation.

original: zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /
analyzed: zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /

original: nyi ma gzas bzung ba mthong nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma gzas bzung ba mthong nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag par bya'o //
translated: Seeing a solar eclipse, one should recite [the mantra] twenty-one times.

original: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //

original: ji srid bklags pa de srid du bud med steng phrag gcig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid bklags pa de srid du bud med steng phrag gcig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as one recites, for that long one woman after another will come under one's control.

original: lhan cig brjod pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhan cig brjod pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting together, [they] will be brought under control.

original: khro ba'i sems kyis snying por byed pas skrod pa dang rnam par zhe sdang ba dang rengs par yang byed do //
analyzed: khro ba'i sems kyis snying por byed pas skrod pa dang rnam par zhe sdang ba dang rengs par yang byed do //
translated: By making the essence with an angry mind, one can banish, cause hatred, and paralyze.

original: dbang du bya bar 'dod pas me tog la yongs su bzlas nas nam mkha' la 'phangs na /
analyzed: dbang du bya bar 'dod pas me tog la yongs su bzlas nas nam mkha' la 'phangs na /
translated: One who desires to bring under control should recite over a flower and throw it into the sky.

original: tshangs ba la sogs pa mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: tshangs ba la sogs pa mthong bar byed do //
translated: One will see Brahmā and so forth.

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas nas khyim dang grong dang grong khyer du 'phangs na sreg par mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas nas khyim dang grong dang grong khyer du 'phangs na sreg par mthong bar byed do //
translated: By reciting once over charnel ground ash and throwing it into a house, village, or city, one will see a burning.

original: rma bya'i sgro la lan cig bzlas nas nam mkha' la bskor na slar yang zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgro la lan cig bzlas nas nam mkha' la bskor na slar yang zhi bar byed do //
translated: By reciting once over a peacock feather and whirling it in the sky, one will again pacify.

original: kar la lan cig bzlas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na dpung tshogs yan lag bzhir mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: kar la lan cig bzlas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na dpung tshogs yan lag bzhir mthong bar byed do //
translated: Having recited the mantra once, if one scatters [the ashes] in the four directions, one will cause the four divisions of the army to be seen.

original: rma bya'i sgros phyir bzlog nas bskor na slar yang med par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgros phyir bzlog nas bskor na slar yang med par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having turned back with the peacock feather, one will again cause [the army] to disappear.

original: da ni sgyu ma chen mo'i dur khrod brjod par bye ste /
analyzed: da ni sgyu ma chen mo'i dur khrod brjod par bye ste /
translated: Now, the charnel grounds of the Great Illusion will be explained.

original: shar phyogs kyi cha la dkyil 'khor @235b gyi sgrub pa po rjes su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod do //
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi cha la dkyil 'khor @235b gyi sgrub pa po rjes su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod do //
translated: In the eastern direction, there is the charnel ground called Holder of the Mandala of Practitioners.

original: byang du gnyis su med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang du gnyis su med par byed pa'o //
translated: In the north, there is Maker of Non-duality.

original: nub tu khro bo'i gdong ngo //
analyzed: nub tu khro bo'i gdong ngo //
translated: In the west, there is Wrathful Face.

original: lho ru mun pa mi bzad pa'o //
analyzed: lho ru mun pa mi bzad pa'o //
translated: In the south, there is Unbearable Darkness.

original: me ru 'jigs pa chen po'o //
analyzed: me ru 'jigs pa chen po'o //
translated: In the southeast, there is Great Fear.

original: bden bral du rnal 'byor mang po'i 'dus pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bden bral du rnal 'byor mang po'i 'dus pa chen po'o //
translated: In the southwest, there is Great Assembly of Yoginis.

original: rlung du seng ge'i sgra phat chen po sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung du seng ge'i sgra phat chen po sgrogs pa'o //
translated: In the northwest, there is Roaring the Great Lion's Roar.

original: dbang ldan du chu skyes sa bon zhes bya ba'i dur khrod rnams so //
analyzed: dbang ldan du chu skyes sa bon zhes bya ba'i dur khrod rnams so //
translated: In the northeast, there is the charnel ground called Seed of the Lotus.

original: 'di rnams su ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor bas lus dang yan lag sreg pa dang / phyed sreg pa dang lus nyams pa dang / lus phyed nyams pa 'jigs pa'i rnam pa 'jigs par byed pa dang // mdung gis phug pa'i ro bcings pa dang /🔽skyanna  ra dang / kam ko la li dang / aa mra dang / shi ri sha dang / au du mw'a ra dang / aa shvadth'a dang / n'a ga ge sar gyi shing rnams so //🔽go rims bzhin du ma he dang byi la dang / dom dang stag dang / bya rgod dang phag dang / sha za'i gdong ba can rdzu 'phrul chen po'i gnod sbyin rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rnams su ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor bas lus dang yan lag sreg pa dang / phyed sreg pa dang lus nyams pa dang / lus phyed nyams pa 'jigs pa'i rnam pa 'jigs par byed pa dang // mdung gis phug pa'i ro bcings pa dang / skyanna  ra dang / kam ko la li dang / aa mra dang / shi ri sha dang / au du mw'a ra dang / aa shvadth'a dang / n'a ga ge sar gyi shing rnams so // go rims bzhin du ma he dang byi la dang / dom dang stag dang / bya rgod dang phag dang / sha za'i gdong ba can rdzu 'phrul chen po'i gnod sbyin rnams so //
translated: In these, one should apply the following in the proper order: burning of the body and limbs, burning of half the body, loss of the body, loss of half the body, the terrifying form of the fearful, the corpse pierced by a spear,

analyzed: kun nas dur khrod brgyad du ce spyang dang bya rgod dang 'ug pa dang bya rog dang ro langs la sogs pa zhes so lha mo sgyu ma chen mo'i dur khrod do /

original: // / rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: // / rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: aom hr'i:gha ta ya gha ta ya sarba dusht'am h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:gha ta ya gha ta ya sarba dusht'am h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ghaṭaya ghaṭaya sarva duṣṭān hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gtor ma phul nas bsam gtan bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma phul nas bsam gtan bya'o //
translated: Having offered the bali, one should perform the meditation.

original: lte ba'i dbus su ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum /
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum /
translated: In the center of the navel, the syllable raṃ completely transforms into a triangular fire maṇḍala.

original: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
translated: In its center is a red four-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du hr'i:yig bskal pa'i me bzhin du rab tu 'bar bzhin pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i:yig bskal pa'i me bzhin du rab tu 'bar bzhin pa /
translated: Upon that is the syllable hrīḥ, blazing like the fire of the eon.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo'o //
translated: That completely transforms into oneself as red Vajravārāhī.

original: 'dab ma bzhi la bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma bzhi la bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i padma'i snod bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that on the four petals are lotus bowls filled with the five elixirs.

original: yi dags kyi gdan la g-yas brkyang gi stags kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: yi dags kyi gdan la g-yas brkyang gi stags kyis bzhugs pa /
translated: She stands on a corpse seat in the ardhaparyaṅka posture.

original: gcer bu skra gyen du brdzes pa thod pa'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: gcer bu skra gyen du brdzes pa thod pa'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: She is naked, with disheveled hair and a skull crown.

original: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
translated: She possesses the five symbolic ornaments.

original: phyag bzhi pa'i g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu ba bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa'i g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu ba bsnams pa /
translated: Of her four hands, the two right hands hold a vajra and a goad.

original: g-yon na kha tr'am ga dang thod pa dang sdigs mdzub kyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon na kha tr'am ga dang thod pa dang sdigs mdzub kyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: In the left [hand] a Khatvānga, a skull-cup, and a threatening forefinger.

original: zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /

original: khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal gtsigs pa'o //
analyzed: khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal gtsigs pa'o //

original: rdo rje rnam dang shin tu 'jigs byed ma dang / lto chen ma dang / ljags bskyod ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //🔽aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha ya @236a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rnam dang shin tu 'jigs byed ma dang / lto chen ma dang / ljags bskyod ma rnams bsgom par bya'o // aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha ya @236a * //
translated: One should meditate on Vajravārāhī, Bhairavī, Mahābhairavī, and Jihva-cālinī.

original: sarba dusht'am hrim sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba dusht'am hrim sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-vārāhī āveśaya sarva-duṣṭān hūṃ svāhā.

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //

original: aom hr'i h'um hr'im hr'im snying po'o //
analyzed: aom hr'i h'um hr'im hr'im snying po'o //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ hūṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ. The essence mantra.

original: 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite it one hundred thousand times.

original: 'dir ting nge 'dzin du gyur pas 'grub par the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'dir ting nge 'dzin du gyur pas 'grub par the tshom med do //
translated: Here, by becoming absorbed in contemplation, one will certainly succeed.

original: aom aa hr'i:h'um ham ha:sngags 'dis sha chen phye mar byas nas ri mo'i mdun du spos dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom aa hr'i:h'um ham ha:sngags 'dis sha chen phye mar byas nas ri mo'i mdun du spos dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Oṃ a-hrīḥ hūṃ haṃ haḥ. With this mantra, having made a powder of human flesh, one should offer incense in front of the painting.

original: nyin re bzhin ji srid du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: nyin re bzhin ji srid du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Every day, as long as [one does this] twenty-one times, one will succeed, not otherwise.

original: aom h'um h'um ham ha:ha:hrim hrim phem phem phem phat ka ram zhes mtshan mo gtor ma dbul nas bdud thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo gtor ma dang yo byad lnga sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: aom h'um h'um ham ha:ha:hrim hrim phem phem phem phat ka ram zhes mtshan mo gtor ma dbul nas bdud thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo gtor ma dang yo byad lnga sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ haṃ haḥ hriṃ hriṃ phaṃ phaṃ phaṃ phaṭ karaṃ. Having offered the evening bali in this way, one should give the evening bali and the five articles for the sake of pacifying all obstacles.

original: gang 'ga' zhig tu smra bar yang mi bya ste /
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig tu smra bar yang mi bya ste /
translated: One should not speak at all.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor mas 'dir byin gyis rlob par the tshom med do //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor mas 'dir byin gyis rlob par the tshom med do //
translated: Vajrayoginī will certainly bless one here.

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo rtog pa las gsungs pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo rtog pa las gsungs pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The method of accomplishing all the topics taught in the Tantra of Glorious Vajravārāhī is complete.
